translations: n.暧昧；隐蔽；有阴影的情形

phrs.translation: 有阴影的情形, 可疑, 暧昧, 的中文释义

sentences.sentence: It is one of the approaches to reveal the history of forepart Qin to identify the credit and shadiness of the tales.
sentences.translation: 辨清传说的可信之处和信史的可疑之处，是揭示早期琴史的途径之一。

sentences.sentence: This system can detect known computer virus and can analysis and judge shadiness program, diagnose which kind of computer virus is infected.
sentences.translation: 此系统既可查杀已知病毒，也可分析评判可疑程序，诊断出被感染病毒以及病毒类型。
